headline: Leicester City Women add former Spurs defender Asmita Ale
summary: Leicester City have brought back Asmita Ale from Spurs on a permanent basis, following her successful loan spell last season. The 22-year-old, who has been capped by England at U-17, U-18 and U-19 levels youth […]

headline: Former Villa defender Jodie Hutton joins Charlton Athletic Women
summary: Charlton Athletic have brought in 23-year-old former Aston Villa and Bristol City defender Jodie Hutton who recently left Sheffield United. Capped by England at U-18 and U-19 level, she played over 60 times and scored […]

headline: Brighton Women sign Tanzanian striker Aisha Masaka
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion have signed Tanzanian international striker Aisha Masaka from Swedish top-flight club BK Hacken. The 20-year-old has nine goals from 15 appearances for her country, whom she helped qualify for the Women’s […]

headline: England Women’s U-19s draw with Serbia after late penalty
summary: England drew 1-1 against Serbia in the UEFA Women’s U-19 Championship Group Stage in Lithuania thanks to a Mia Enderby spot-kick.  England’s Vivienne Lia forced a save in the first minute but Serbia quickly grew […]

headline: Lucy Bronze joins Chelsea Women on two-year deal
summary: England international defender Lucy Bronze returns to the WSL with Chelsea after two seasons at Barcelona. The 32-year-old has well over 100 caps for England with whom she won EURO 2022 and reached the 2023 […]

headline: Manchester United Women sign Norway striker Elisabeth Terland
summary: Manchester United have signed Norway international Elisabeth Terland until the end of the 2025/26 season, with an option for a further year. The striker joins from Brighton & Hove Albion, where she made 39 appearances […]

headline: England, Italy and Netherlands qualify for UEFA Women’s Euro
summary: The final round of qualifying group games for UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 saw England, Italy and Netherlands book their places in Switzerland next summer. The draw for two rounds of two-legged play-offs is at 12pm […]

headline: Northern Ireland Women secure second spot in group
summary: Northern Ireland beat Bosnia and Herzegovina 2-0 at Windsor Park to finish second in their UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Qualifying Group. Already in the play-offs, the Irish could now be seeded for the first round […]

headline: Scotland Women win group decider against Serbia
summary: Scotland edged Serbia 1-0 in their UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Qualifying Group decider, to step back up to League A. Kirsty Smith hit the crossbar from outside the box, before Scotland went ahead six minutes […]

headline: Fishlock breaks goalscoring record as Wales Women top table
summary: Wales beat Kosovo 2-0 in Llanelli to top their UEFA Women’s EURO 2025 Qualifying group and go back up to League A. Jess Fishlock took just eight minutes of the game to overtake Helen Ward […]
